x26_s7: End state
x27: [Lib] Inventory full dialog: Item display
x27_p0: Text ID
x27_p1: Item lottery ID
x27_s0: Start state
x27_s1: OK dialog: Display
x27_s1_e0: [FE] Display item acquisition failure window
x27_s2: OK dialog: Wait
x27_s3: End state
